scores.user: pix-think I want to try this PiX thing...

scores.dialogue: pix-edit name the score and add a description

scores.system: pix-update the system transforms and formats the input

scores.dialogue: pix-input press 'TAB' to advance in the sequence

scores.user: pix-think I want to save this work
scores.system: pix-process generate JSON on the fly

scores.dialogue: pix-message prompt waht to do with the file
scores.system: pix-save save the file in your HD
